item.title: No title
SoundCloud group The New Era Museum Most Wanted Music Visionaries
item.description:
SoundCloud group The New Era Museum Most Wanted Music Visionaries

Promote the creation of art on mobile devices, in order to spread a form of active thought, which will help to build a new era in society, a new culture, and free our artistic expression even further. Further infos here: http://neweramuseum.org The New Era Museum (NEM) is a no profit organization formed by artists coming from all over the globe.

item.title: IMPOSSIBLE HUMANS - Pollock Project / photo by New Era Museum
item.description:
IMPOSSIBLE HUMANS - Pollock Project / photo by New Era Museum

IMPOSSIBLE HUMANS - Pollock Project ft. NEM Marco Testoni (piano, caisa drum), Simone Salza (alto sax), Elisabetta Antonini (vocal, live electronics). AH!

item.title: A Thousand Words
item.description:
A Thousand Words

I am constantly blown away by the incredible art that comes out of the mobile photography community. Many of the top mobile photographers have come from a background in traditional photography, though quite a few have had very little experience in the craft.

item.title: iPhone photography Muscari featured by New Era Museum | Skipology
item.description:
iPhone photography Muscari featured by New Era Museum | Skipology

Muscari is a recent image created following the recent upgrade to Mextures v2. The painterly, textured processing was accomplished entirely using Mextures and is an alternative edit to my recently published Muscari texture blending workflow. My video tutorial and step by step Mextures guide can be viewed here.

item.title: New Era for Rome
item.description:
New Era for Rome

New Era Museum - Impossible Humans had stopped in Rome. The meeting point is Galleria Lancellotti in piazza Lancellotti from now to 26th March (it opens Monday-Saturday from 4.30 to 7.30 PM) On the right Alessandra Serpieri, Art Director of Galleria Lancellotti, on the left Edward Santos, winner of the contest Impossible Humans - Portraits....

item.title: FIPA - Summer 2015 on Flipboard
item.description:
FIPA - Summer 2015 on Flipboard

By Andrea Bigiarini | Florence International Photography Awards

item.title: NEM Red 05/06 - Curated by Lisa Peters
item.description:
NEM Red 05/06 - Curated by Lisa Peters

DOUBLE FEATURE LISA PETERS - RED FOUNDER AND NEM ARTIST Thanks to everyone for submitting such amazing RED art.What emerged is a collection of studies of the superhuman figure in self inflicted, self indulgent isolation. A beautifully almost abject state of being, which reflects an ironically alluring price of the power of RED.
